errors.error_description: The installation instructions have a logical order error: they install robotframework globally first, then create and activate a virtual environment. The package should be installed after activating the venv to keep it isolated.
correction_candidates:
The commands should be:

    python -m venv .venv
    source .venv/bin/activate
    pip install robotframework
The commands should be:

    pip install --user robotframework
    python -m venv .venv
    source .venv/bin/activate
The commands should be:

    python -m venv .venv
    pip install robotframework
The commands should be:

    pip install robotframework
    python -m venv --system-site-packages .venv
    source .venv/bin/activate
errors.golden_answer:
The commands should be:

    python -m venv .venv
    source .venv/bin/activate
    pip install robotframework
